channel.title: CVE Feed for Creative Themes -- Blocksy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Creative Themes -- Blocksy

item.title: CVE-2024-24871|2024-06-04T17:43:24.274Z -- creative%20themes -- blocksy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Creative Themes Blocksy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Blocksy: from n/a through 2.0.19.
